content: 3 double_crochet in next 4 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top round-3 chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top 12m-24m skip to round 7 round- 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 6 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 7 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top 2t-4t skip to round 7 round- 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next 7 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 8 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top round- 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next 8 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 9 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top round 7- chain 3 double_crochet in next 14 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 15 sts 2dc in next repeat around slip_stitch to top in this row you may count the sts to make sure it is a multiple of 3 if not you may increase or decrease here round 8-10 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to top do not finish off pink change to white round 9 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around finish off white change to pink rnds-10-12 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around for sizes 12-24m skip to shell rnds round 13 repeat round 9 rnds 14-16 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to top for sizes 2t-3t skip to shell rnds for sizes 4-5 do 2 more rnds double_crochet then skip to shell rnds round 17 repeat round 9 rnds 18-21 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to top here you may increase of decrease the number of rnds to get the fit you want shell rounds do the same as shell on skirt here you may also add more row of shell if desired finish off sew in all ends
